ygData.subject: Re: Thermal yada yada
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes I ve killed him a few times.  He only drops the dark elf head that you give to Tergon for a free Elemental Grimoire & faction.  Mind you, it s been about 2
ygData.messageBody:
Yes I've killed him a few times. He only drops the dark elf head that you
give to Tergon for a free Elemental Grimoire & faction. Mind you, it's
been about 2 months since I've killed him.

QdP

--- cerceta@... wrote:
> Ok we have discovered the gemcutter hurray! As for the thermal cloak.
> Staying with the idea that it can't be made and it is a mob drop just
> like the diamond dust and the fact that diamond dust is a HIGH level mob
> drop. I was wondering if anyone has killed Toko Binlittle in OOT? He
> himself
> is not a high level npc but the giant that stands next to him is, 40's
> or so
> I hear. Just a thought.
>
> Grundup PuddlejumperTinkerTot
